name: To the Cheese
description:
Gobal heat is melting all the ice in the world!! Your life is on risk now, you must start to jump NOW! Reach the cheese moon and save your life!

Use ARROW or AWSD keys to MOVE and JUMP
Press "M" to toggle ENDLESS mode.
Press "X" to toggle between WINDWO SIZE modes.
Press "C" to toggle between COLOR palettes.

Click outside the game window to pause.

Tips and facts:
- Don't get nervous, be consistent, water is always slower than you.
- You CAN get out of the water if you are close to the surface swimming throught the platforms, not easy though.
- You only need to run for long jumps.
- The cheese is not that far! Go for it!

Game made for the #LOWREZJAM 2016


Code, graphics and music made by me.

Made with Unity.
